sunelement.name: position
sunelement.description: 检索对象的定位方式

sunelement.name: z-index
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的层叠顺序

sunelement.name: top
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象参照相对物顶边界向下偏移位置。

sunelement.name: right
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象参照相对物右边界向左偏移位置。

sunelement.name: bottom
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象参照相对物右边界向上偏移位置。

sunelement.name: left
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象参照相对物右边界向右偏移位置。

sunelement.name: clip
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的可视区域。区域外的部分是透明的

sunelement.name: display
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象是否及如何显示

sunelement.name: float
sunelement.description: 该属性的值指出了对象是否及如何浮动。请参阅clear属性

sunelement.name: clear
sunelement.description: 该属性的值指出了不允许有浮动对象的边。请参阅float属性

sunelement.name: visibility
sunelement.description: 设置或检索是否显示对象。与display属性不同，此属性为隐藏的对象保留器占据的物理空间

sunelement.name: overflow
sunelement.description: 复合属性。检索或设置对象处理溢出内容的方式

sunelement.name: overflow-x
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象处理横向溢出内容的方式。

sunelement.name: overflow-y
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象处理纵向溢出内容的方式。

sunelement.name: width
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的宽度

sunelement.name: min-width
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的最小宽度

sunelement.name: max-width
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的最大宽度

sunelement.name: height
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的高度

sunelement.name: min-height
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的最小高度

sunelement.name: max-height
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的最大高度

sunelement.name: margin
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对四边的外延边距

sunelement.name: margin-top
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象顶边的外延边距

sunelement.name: margin-right
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象右边的外延边距

sunelement.name: margin-bottom
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象底边的外延边距

sunelement.name: margin-left
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象左边的外延边距

sunelement.name: border
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置对象边框的特性

sunelement.name: border-width
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象边框宽度

sunelement.name: border-style
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象边框样式

sunelement.name: border-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象边框颜色

sunelement.name: border-top
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置对象顶边的特性

sunelement.name: border-top-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象顶边宽度

sunelement.name: border-top-style
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象顶边样式

sunelement.name: border-top-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象顶边颜色

sunelement.name: border-right
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置对象右边的特性

sunelement.name: border-right-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象右边宽度

sunelement.name: border-right-style
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象右边样式

sunelement.name: border-right-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象右边颜色

sunelement.name: border-bottom
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置对象底边的特性

sunelement.name: border-bottom-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象底边宽度

sunelement.name: border-bottom-style
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象底边样式

sunelement.name: border-bottom-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象底边颜色

sunelement.name: border-left
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置对象左边的特性

sunelement.name: border-left-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象左边宽度

sunelement.name: border-left-style
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象左边样式

sunelement.name: border-left-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象左边颜色

sunelement.name: border-radius
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象使用圆角边框

sunelement.name: border-top-left-radius
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象左上角圆角边框

sunelement.name: border-top-right-radius
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象右上角圆角边框

sunelement.name: border-bottom-left-radius
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象左下角圆角边框

sunelement.name: border-bottom-right-radius
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象右下角圆角边框

sunelement.name: box-shadow
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象阴影

sunelement.name: border-image
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的边框样式使用图像俩填充

sunelement.name: border-image-source
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的边框是否用图像定义样式或图像来源路径

sunelement.name: border-image-slice
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的边框背景图的分割方式

sunelement.name: border-image-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的边框厚度

sunelement.name: border-image-outset
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的边框背景图的扩展

sunelement.name: border-image-repeat
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的边框图像的平铺方式

sunelement.name: backround
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置或检索对象的背景特性

sunelement.name: background-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的背景颜色

sunelement.name: background-image
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的背景图片

sunelement.name: background-repeat
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的背景图像如何铺排填充

sunelement.name: background-attacment
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的背景图像是随对象内容滚动还是固定的

sunelement.name: background-position
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的背景图像位置

sunelement.name: background-origin
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的背景图像显示的原点

sunelement.name: background-clip
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的背景向外裁剪的区域

sunelement.name: background-size
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的背景图像的尺寸大小

sunelement.name: color
sunelement.description: 指定颜色

sunelement.name: opacity
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的不透明度

sunelement.name: font
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置或检索对象中的文本特性

sunelement.name: font-style
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中的字体样式

sunelement.name: font-variant
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中的文本是否为小型的大写字母

sunelement.name: font-weigt
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中的文本字体的粗细

sunelement.name: font-size
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中的字体尺寸

sunelement.name: font-family
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中文本的字体名称序列

sunelement.name: font-stretch
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中的文字是否横向拉伸变形

sunelement.name: font-size-adjust
sunelement.description: 设置或检索小写字母x的高度与对象文字字号的比率

sunelement.name: text-transform
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的文本的大小写

sunelement.name: white-space
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象内空格的处理方式

sunelement.name: tab-size
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的制表符的长度

sunelement.name: word-wrap
sunelement.description: 设置或检索当前内容超过指定容器的边界时是否断行

sunelement.name: overflow-wrap
sunelement.description: 设置或检索当前内容超过指定容器的边界时是否断行

sunelement.name: word-break
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象内文本的字内换行行为

sunelement.name: text-align
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中内容的水平对齐方式

sunelement.name: text-align-last
sunelement.description: 设置或检索一个块内的最后一行(包括块内仅一行文本的情况，这时既是第一行也是最后一行)或者被强制打断的行的对齐方式

sunelement.name: text-justify
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象内调整文本使用的对齐方式

sunelement.name: word-spacing
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的单词之间的最小，最大和最佳间隙

sunelement.name: letter-spacing
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中字符之间的最小，最大和最佳间隙

sunelement.name: text-indent
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的文本的缩进

sunelement.name: vertical-align
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中内容的垂直对齐方式

sunelement.name: line-height
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的行高。即字体最低端与字体内部顶端之间的距离

sunelement.name: text-size-adjust
sunelement.description: 检索或设置移动端页面对象文本的大小调整

sunelement.name: text-decoration
sunelement.description: 复合属性。检索或设置对象中的文本的装饰

sunelement.name: text-decoration-line
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的文本装饰线条的位置

sunelement.name: text-decoration-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的文本装饰线条的颜色

sunelement.name: text-decoration-style
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的文本装饰线条的形状

sunelement.name: text-decoration-skip
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的文本装饰线条必须略过内容中的哪些部分

sunelement.name: text-underline-position
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的下划线的位置

sunelement.name: text-shadow
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中文本的文字是否有阴影及模糊效果

sunelement.name: direction
sunelement.description: 检索或设置文本流的方向

sunelement.name: unicode-bidi
sunelement.description: 用于同一个页面里存在不同方向读进的文本显示。与direction属性一起使用

sunelement.name: writing-mode
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的内容块固有的书写方向

sunelement.name: list-style
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置列表项目相关内容

sunelement.name: list-style-image
sunelement.description: 设置或检索作为对象的列表项标记的图像

sunelement.name: list-style-position
sunelement.description: 设置或检索作为对象的列表项标记如何根文本排列

sunelement.name: list-style-type
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的列表项所使用的预设标记

sunelement.name: table-layot
sunelement.description: 设置或检索表格的布局算法

sunelement.name: border-collapse
sunelement.description: 设置或检索表格的行和单元格的边是合并在一起还是按照标准的HTML样式分开

sunelement.name: border-spacing
sunelement.description: 设置或检索表格边框独立时，行和单元格的边框在横向和纵向上的间距

sunelement.name: caption-side
sunelement.description: 设置或检索表格的caption对象是在表格的那一边

sunelement.name: empty-cells
sunelement.description: 设置或检索当表格的单元格无内容时，是否显示该单元格的边框

sunelement.name: content
sunelement.description: 用来和:after及:before伪元素一起使用，在对象前或后显示内容

sunelement.name: counter-increment
sunelement.description: 设定当一个selector发生时计数器增加的值

sunelement.name: counter-reset
sunelement.description: 将指定selector的计数器复位

sunelement.name: quotes
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象内使用的嵌套标记

sunelement.name: appearance
sunelement.description: 设置或检索外观按照本地默认样式

sunelement.name: text-overflow
sunelement.description: 当块容器overflow为非visible时，定义内联内容溢出其块容器是否截断或者添加(...)及自定义字符

sunelement.name: outline
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置或检索对象外的线条轮廓

sunelement.name: outline-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象外的线条轮廓的宽度

sunelement.name: outline-style
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象外的线条轮廓的样式

sunelement.name: outline-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象外的线条轮廓的颜色

sunelement.name: outline-offset
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象外的线条轮廓偏移位置的数值

sunelement.name: nav-index
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的导航顺序

sunelement.name: nav-up
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的导航方向

sunelement.name: nav-right
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的导航方向

sunelement.name: nav-down
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的导航方向

sunelement.name: nav-left
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的导航方向

sunelement.name: cursor
sunelement.description: 设置或检索在对象上移动的鼠标指针采用何种系统预定义的光标形状

sunelement.name: zoom
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的缩放比例

sunelement.name: box-sizing
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的盒模型组成模式

sunelement.name: resize
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的区域是否允许用户缩放，调节元素尺寸大小

sunelement.name: ime-mode
sunelement.description: 设置或检索是否允许用户激活输入中文，韩文，日文等输入法(IME)状态

sunelement.name: user-select
sunelement.description: 设置或检索是否允许用户选中文本

sunelement.name: pointer-events
sunelement.description: 设置或检索在何时成为属性事件的target

sunelement.name: columns
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的列数和每列的宽度。复合属性

sunelement.name: column-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象每列的宽度

sunelement.name: column-count
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的列数

sunelement.name: column-gap
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的列与列之间的间隙

sunelement.name: column-rule
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的列与列之间的边框。复合属性

sunelement.name: column-rule-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的列与列之间的边框厚度

sunelement.name: column-rule-style
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的列与列之间的边框样式

sunelement.name: column-rule-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的列与列之间的边框颜色

sunelement.name: column-span
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象元素是否横跨所有列

sunelement.name: column-fill
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象所有列的高度是否统一

sunelement.name: column-break-before
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象之前是否断行

sunelement.name: column-break-after
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象之后是否断行

sunelement.name: column-break-inside
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象内部是否断行

sunelement.name: box-orient
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素的排列方式

sunelement.name: box-pack
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素的对齐方式

sunelement.name: box-align
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素的对齐方式

sunelement.name: box-flex
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素如何分配其剩余空间

sunelement.name: box-flex-group
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素的所属组

sunelement.name: box-ordinal-group
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素的显示顺序

sunelement.name: box-direction
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素的排列顺序是否反转

sunelement.name: box-lines
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素是否可以换行显示

sunelement.name: flex
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素如何分配空间

sunelement.name: flex-grow
sunelement.description: 设置或检索弹性盒的扩展比率

sunelement.name: flex-shrink
sunelement.description: 设置或检索弹性盒的收缩比率

sunelement.name: flex-basis
sunelement.description: 设置或检索弹性盒伸缩基准值

sunelement.name: flex-flow
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素排列方式

sunelement.name: flex-direction
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素的显示顺序

sunelement.name: flex-wrap
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素超出父容器时是否换行

sunelement.name: align-content
sunelement.description: 设置或检索弹性盒堆叠伸缩行的对齐方式

sunelement.name: align-items
sunelement.description: 设置或检索弹性盒子元素在侧轴(纵轴)方向上的对齐方式

sunelement.name: align-self
sunelement.description: 设置或检索弹性盒子元素自身在侧轴(纵轴)方向上的对齐方式

sunelement.name: justify-content
sunelement.description: 设置或检索弹性盒子元素在主轴(横轴)方向上的对齐方式

sunelement.name: order
sunelement.description: 设置或检索伸缩盒对象的子元素出现的顺序

sunelement.name: transform
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象的变换

sunelement.name: transform-origin
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的变换所参照的原点

sunelement.name: transform-style
sunelement.description: 指定某元素的子元素是否位于三维空间内

sunelement.name: perspective
sunelement.description: 指定观察者与z=0平面的距离

sunelement.name: perspective-origin
sunelement.description: 指定透视点的位置

sunelement.name: backface-visibility
sunelement.description: 指定元素背面面向用户时是否可见

sunelement.name: transition
sunelement.description: 复合属性。检索或设置对象变换时的过渡效果

sunelement.name: transition-property
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中的参与过渡的属性

sunelement.name: transition-duration
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象过渡的持续时间

sunelement.name: transition-timing-function
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象中过渡的类型

sunelement.name: transition-delay
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象延迟过渡的时间

sunelement.name: animation
sunelement.description: 复合属性。检索或设置对象所应用的动画特效

sunelement.name: animation-name
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象所应用的动画名称

sunelement.name: animation-duration
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象动画的持续时间

sunelement.name: animation-timing-function
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象动画的过渡类型

sunelement.name: animation-delay
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象动画延迟的时间

sunelement.name: animation-iteration-count
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象动画的循环次数

sunelement.name: animation-direction
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象动画在循环中是否反向运动

sunelement.name: animation-play-state
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象动画的状态

sunelement.name: animation-fill-mode
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象动画时间之外的状态

sunelement.name: page
sunelement.description: 检索或设置显示对象容器时使用的页面类型

sunelement.name: page-break-before
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象之前出现的页分割符

sunelement.name: page-break-after
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象之后出现的页分割符

sunelement.name: page-break-inside
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象容器内部出现的页分割符

sunelement.name: width
sunelement.description: 定义输出设备中的压面可见区域宽度

sunelement.name: height
sunelement.description: 定义输出设备中的页面可见区域高度

sunelement.name: device-width
sunelement.description: 定义输出设备的屏幕可见宽度

sunelement.name: device-height
sunelement.description: 定义输出设备的屏幕可见高度

sunelement.name: orientation
sunelement.description: 定义height是否大于或等于width。值portrait代表是，landscape代表否

sunelement.name: aspect-ratio
sunelement.description: 定义width与height的比率

sunelement.name: device-aspect-ratio
sunelement.description: 定义'device-width'与'device-height'的比率。如常见的显示器比率：4/3, 16/9, 16/10

sunelement.name: color
sunelement.description: 定义每一组输出设备的彩色原件个数。如果不是彩色设备，则值等于0

sunelement.name: color-index
sunelement.description: 定义在输出设备的彩色查询表中的条目数。如果没有使用彩色查询表，则值等于0

sunelement.name: monochrome
sunelement.description: 定义在一个单色框架缓冲区中每像素包含的单色原件个数。如果不是单色设备，则值等于0

sunelement.name: resolution
sunelement.description: 定义设备的分辨率。如：96dpi, 300dpi, 118dpcm

sunelement.name: scan
sunelement.description: 定义电视类设备的扫描工序

sunelement.name: grid
sunelement.description: 用来查询输出设备是否使用栅格或点阵。只有1和0才是有效值，1代表是，0代表否

sunelement.name: ecrollbar-3dlight-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象滚动条3d亮色阴影边框(threedlightshadow)的外观颜色。

sunelement.name: ecrollbar-darkshadow-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象滚动条3d暗色阴影边框(threedlightshadow)的外观颜色。

sunelement.name: ecrollbar-highlight-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象滚动条3d高亮边框(threedlightshadow)的外观颜色。

sunelement.name: ecrollbar-shadow-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象滚动条3d阴影边框(threedlightshadow)的外观颜色。

sunelement.name: ecrollbar-arrow-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象滚动条方向箭头的颜色。当滚动条出现但不可用时，此属性失效

sunelement.name: ecrollbar-face-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象滚动条3D表面的(threedface)的外观颜色

sunelement.name: ecrollbar-track-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象滚动条拖动区域的外观颜色

sunelement.name: ecrollbar-base-color
sunelement.description: 检索或设置对象滚动条基准颜色，其它界面颜色将据此自动调整

sunelement.name: filter
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象所应用的滤镜效果

sunelement.name: behavior
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的DHTML行为

sunelement.name: border-colors
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象边框的多重颜色

sunelement.name: border-top-colors
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象顶边的多重颜色

sunelement.name: border-right-colors
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象右边的多重颜色

sunelement.name: border-bottom-colors
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象底边的多重颜色

sunelement.name: border-left-colors
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象左边的多重颜色

sunelement.name: text-fill-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中的文字填充颜色

sunelement.name: text-stroke
sunelement.description: 复合属性。设置或检索对象中的文字的描边

sunelement.name: text-stroke-width
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中的文字的描边厚度

sunelement.name: text-stroke-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象中的文字的描边颜色

sunelement.name: box-reflect
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象的倒影

sunelement.name: tap-highlight-color
sunelement.description: 设置或检索对象轻按时高亮

sunelement.name: user-drag
sunelement.description: 设置或检索一个元素可以被拖拽，而不是它的内容

sunelement.name: 通配选择符(*)
sunelement.description: (Uuniversal Selector)所有元素对象

sunelement.name: 类型选择符(E)
sunelement.description: (Type Selector)以文档语言对象类型作为选择符

sunelement.name: ID选择符(E#id)
sunelement.description: (ID Selector)以唯一标识符id属性等于myid的E对象作为选择符

sunelement.name: 类选择符(E.class)
sunelement.description: (Class Selector)以class属性包含myclass的E对象作为选择符

sunelement.name: 包含选择符(E F)
sunelement.description: (Descendant combinator)选择所有被E元素包含的F元素

sunelement.name: 子选择符(E>F)
sunelement.description: (Child combinator)选择所有作为E元素的子元素F

sunelement.name: 相邻选择符(E+F)
sunelement.description: (Adjacent sibling combinator)选择紧贴在E元素之后F元素

sunelement.name: 兄弟选择符(E~F)
sunelement.description: (General sibling combinator)选择E元素所有兄弟元素F

sunelement.name: E[att]
sunelement.description: 选择具有att属性的E元素

sunelement.name: E[att='val']
sunelement.description: 选择具有att属性且属性值等于val的E元素

sunelement.name: E[att~='val']
sunelement.description: 选择具有att属性且属性值为一用空格分隔的字词列表，其中一个等于val的E元素

sunelement.name: E[att^='val']
sunelement.description: 选择具有att属性且属性值为以val开头的字符串的E元素

sunelement.name: E[att$='val']
sunelement.description: 选择具有att属性且属性值为以val结尾的字符串的E元素

sunelement.name: E[att*='val']
sunelement.description: 选择具有att属性且属性值为包含val的字符串的E元素

sunelement.name: E[att|='val']
sunelement.description: 选择具有att属性且属性值为以val开头并用连接符 - 分隔的字符串的E元素，如果属性值仅为val，也将被选择。

sunelement.name: E:link
sunelement.description: 设置超链接a在未被访问前的样式

sunelement.name: E:visited
sunelement.description: 设置超链接a在其链接地址已被访问过时的样式

sunelement.name: E:hover
sunelement.description: 设置元素在其鼠标悬停时的样式

sunelement.name: E:active
sunelement.description: 设置元素在被用户激活（在鼠标点击与释放之间发生的事件）时的样式

sunelement.name: E:focus
sunelement.description: 设置元素在成为输入焦点（该元素的onfocus事件发生）时的样式

sunelement.name: E:lang(fr)
sunelement.description: 匹配使用特殊语言的E元素

sunelement.name: E:not(s)
sunelement.description: 匹配不含有s选择符的元素E

sunelement.name: E:root
sunelement.description: 匹配E元素在文档的根元素

sunelement.name: E:first-child
sunelement.description: 匹配父元素的第一个子元素E

sunelement.name: E:last-child
sunelement.description: 匹配父元素的最后一个子元素E

sunelement.name: E:only-child
sunelement.description: 匹配父元素仅有的一个子元素E

sunelement.name: E:nth-child(n)
sunelement.description: 匹配父元素的第n个子元素E

sunelement.name: E:nth-last-child(n)
sunelement.description: 匹配父元素的倒数第n个子元素E

sunelement.name: E:first-of-type
sunelement.description: 匹配同类型中的第一个同级兄弟元素E

sunelement.name: E:last-of-type
sunelement.description: 匹配同类型中的最后一个同级兄弟元素E

sunelement.name: E:only-of-type
sunelement.description: 匹配同类型中的唯一的一个同级兄弟元素E

sunelement.name: E:nth-of-type(n)
sunelement.description: 匹配同类型中的第n个同级兄弟元素E

sunelement.name: E:nth-last-of-type(n)
sunelement.description: 匹配同类型中的倒数第n个同级兄弟元素E

sunelement.name: E:empty
sunelement.description: 匹配没有任何子元素(包括text节点)的元素E

sunelement.name: E:checked
sunelement.description: 匹配用户界面上处于选中状态的元素E。(用于input type为radio与checkbox时)

sunelement.name: E:enabled
sunelement.description: 匹配用户界面上处于可用状态的元素E

sunelement.name: E:disable
sunelement.description: 匹配用户界面上处于禁用状态的元素E

sunelement.name: E:target
sunelement.description: 匹配相关URL指向的E元素

sunelement.name: @page:first
sunelement.description: 设置页面容器第一页使用的样式。仅用于@page规则

sunelement.name: @page:left
sunelement.description: 设置页面容器位于装订线左边的所有页面使用的样式。仅用于@page规则

sunelement.name: @page:right
sunelement.description: 设置页面容器位于装订线右边的所有页面使用的样式。仅用于@page规则

sunelement.name: E:first-letter/E::first-letter
sunelement.description: 设置对象内的第一个字符的样式

sunelement.name: E:first-line/E::first-line
sunelement.description: 设置对象内的第一行的样式

sunelement.name: E:before/E::before
sunelement.description: 设置在对象前（依据对象树的逻辑结构）发生的内容。用来和content属性一起使用

sunelement.name: E:after/E::after
sunelement.description: 设置在对象后（依据对象树的逻辑结构）发生的内容。用来和content属性一起使用

sunelement.name: E:placeholder/E::placeholder
sunelement.description: 设置对象文字占位符的样式

sunelement.name: E:selection/E::selection
sunelement.description: 设置对象被选择时的颜色

childelement.name: !important
childelement.description: 提升指定样式条目的应用优先权

childelement.name: /*comment*/
childelement.description: CSS中的注释/*这里是注释的内容*/

childelement.name: @import
childelement.description: 指定导入的外部样式表及目标媒体。该规则必须在样式表头部最先声明

childelement.name: @charset
childelement.description: 在外部样式表文件内使用。指定该样式表使用的字符编码

childelement.name: @media
childelement.description: 指定样式表规则用于指定的媒体类型和条件

childelement.name: @page
childelement.description: 设置页面容器的版式，方向，边空等

childelement.name: @keyframes
childelement.description: 指定动画名称和动画效果

name: 取值与单位 Values and Units

sunelement.name: length
sunelement.description: <number>接长度单位

sunelement.name: em
sunelement.description: 相对于当前对象内文本的字体尺寸

sunelement.name: ex
sunelement.description: 相对于字符“x”的高度。通常为字体高度的一半

sunelement.name: ch
sunelement.description: 数字“0”的宽度

sunelement.name: rem
sunelement.description: 相对于根元素(即html元素)font-size计算值的倍数

sunelement.name: vw
sunelement.description: 相对于视口的宽度。视口被均分为100单位的vw

sunelement.name: vh
sunelement.description: 相对于视口的宽度。视口被均分为100单位的vh

sunelement.name: vmax
sunelement.description: 相对于视口的宽度或高度，总是相对于大的那个。视口的宽度或高度被均分为100单位的vmax

sunelement.name: vmin
sunelement.description: 相对于视口的宽度或高度，总是相对于小的那个。视口的宽度或高度被均分为100单位的vmin

sunelement.name: cm
sunelement.description: 厘米

sunelement.name: mm
sunelement.description: 毫米

sunelement.name: q
sunelement.description: 1/4毫米（quarter-millimeters）; 1q = 0.25mm

sunelement.name: in
sunelement.description: 英寸（inches）; 1in = 2.54cm

sunelement.name: pt
sunelement.description: 点（points）; 1pt = 1/72in

sunelement.name: pc
sunelement.description: 派卡（picas）; 1pc = 12pt

sunelement.name: px
sunelement.description: 像素（pixels）; 1px = 1/96in

sunelement.name: <angle>
sunelement.description: <number>接角度单位

sunelement.name: deg
sunelement.description: 度(Degrees)

sunelement.name: grad
sunelement.description: 梯度(Gradians)

sunelement.name: rad
sunelement.description: 弧度(Radians)

sunelement.name: turn
sunelement.description: 转、圈(Turns)

sunelement.name: <time>
sunelement.description: <number>接时间单位

sunelement.name: s
sunelement.description: 秒

sunelement.name: ms
sunelement.description: 毫秒

sunelement.name: <frequency>
sunelement.description: <number>接频率单位

sunelement.name: Hz
sunelement.description: 赫兹

sunelement.name: kHz
sunelement.description: 千赫兹

sunelement.name: <fraction>
sunelement.description: <number>接剩余空间数单位

sunelement.name: <grid>
sunelement.description: <number>接网格数单位

sunelement.name: fr
sunelement.description: 剩余空间分配数

sunelement.name: gr
sunelement.description: 网格数

sunelement.name: <resolution>
sunelement.description: <number>接分辨率单位

sunelement.name: dpi
sunelement.description: 每英寸包含点的数量(dots per inch)

sunelement.name: dpcm
sunelement.description: 每厘米包含点的数量(dots per centimeter)

sunelement.name: dppx
sunelement.description: 每像素包含点的数量(dots per pixel)

sunelement.name: <color>
sunelement.description: <number>用来表示颜色的关键字或数值规则

sunelement.name: Color Name
sunelement.description: 用颜色名称来指定颜色。包括基本颜色关键字、系统颜色、SVG颜色关键字等

sunelement.name: HEX
sunelement.description: 十六进制记法。语法如：#rrggbb或#rgb

sunelement.name: RGB
sunelement.description: rgb记法

sunelement.name: RGBA
sunelement.description: rgba记法

sunelement.name: HSL
sunelement.description: hsl记法

sunelement.name: HSLA
sunelement.description: hsla记法

sunelement.name: transparent
sunelement.description: 全透明

sunelement.name: currentColor
sunelement.description: 当前颜色

sunelement.name: inherit
sunelement.description: 该值使得属性能够继承祖先设置

sunelement.name: initial
sunelement.description: 属性初始值

sunelement.name: unset
sunelement.description: 擦除属性申明

sunelement.name: <string>
sunelement.description: string记法

sunelement.name: <url>
sunelement.description: 在网页上提供一个资源地址。(图像，音频，视频或浏览器支持的其他任何资源)

sunelement.name: <identifier>
sunelement.description: 使用用户自定义标识名作为组件取值

sunelement.name: calc()
sunelement.description: 用于动态计算长度

sunelement.name: toggle()
sunelement.description: 允许子孙元素使用取值序列中的值循环替换继承而来的值

sunelement.name: counter()
sunelement.description: 插入计数器

sunelement.name: counters()
sunelement.description: 重复插入的计数器

sunelement.name: attr()
sunelement.description: 插入元素的属性值

sunelement.name: <image>
sunelement.description: 用来表示一个2D图像

sunelement.name: image()
sunelement.description: 用来指定图像或者图像替代

sunelement.name: image-set()
sunelement.description: 根据用户设备的分辨率匹配合适的图像

sunelement.name: <gradient>
sunelement.description: 使用简单的语法实现颜色渐变，以便UA在渲染页面自动生成图像

sunelement.name: linear-gradient()
sunelement.description: 用线性渐变创建图像

sunelement.name: radial-gradient()
sunelement.description: 用径向渐变创建图像

sunelement.name: repeating-linear-gradient()
sunelement.description: 用重复的线性渐变创建图像

sunelement.name: repeating-radial-gradient()
sunelement.description: 用重复的径向渐变创建图像

sunelement.name: <number>
sunelement.description: 浮点数

sunelement.name: <integer>
sunelement.description: 整数

sunelement.name: <percentage>
sunelement.description: <number>接%
